contents.text: Welcome to Chegg South Bay, your destination for step-by-step textbook solutions, instant online tutoring, and up to ninety percent savings on rentals.
For textbook solutions and rental inquiries, press 1.
To rent or buy textbooks at up to ninety percent off, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our textbook rentals department.

navigationGoals: Rent a specific textbook at the deepest available discount
I need to rent my required textbooks at up to 90% off using my GI Bill benefits.
I need to optimize my textbook rental for Data Structures (ISBN 9780134190440) and apply any available promo codes.
I need help renting my physics textbook at the discounted rate.
I’d like to rent Jackson’s Classical Electrodynamics at the discounted rate.

contents.text: For step-by-step textbook solutions and homework help, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our textbook solutions team.

navigationGoals: Access step-by-step solutions for problems in my textbook
I want step-by-step solutions for my calculus assignments to prepare for exams.
I need a step-by-step proof for the Fourier series convergence example in my Signals and Systems textbook.
I’d like step-by-step solutions for my biology homework.
I need a step-by-step solution to problem 5.8 in Griffiths’ Electrodynamics.

contents.text: To connect with an online tutor or learn about our tutoring services, press 2.
To speak with an online tutor now, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an available tutor.

navigationGoals: Connect immediately with an online tutor for on-demand help
I’d like to connect with an online tutor now to review my statistics problems.
I want to connect with a tutor right now to debug my Java multithreading code.
I want to speak with a tutor right away for help on my statistics assignment.
I want to speak with a physics tutor right now to go over quantum mechanics.

contents.text: For information on tutoring packages and pricing, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our tutoring services specialist.

navigationGoals: Get details on tutoring packages and pricing
I’m calling to learn about tutoring packages and pricing to plan my veteran education budget.
I’d like to review the pricing tiers for recurring monthly tutoring subscriptions versus single-session rates in discrete mathematics.
I’d like information on your tutoring packages and pricing.
I’m calling to find out pricing and package options for physics tutoring sessions.
